data.comment: Today's referee, Akihiko Ikeuchi, has blown to start the match.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Cerezo in the half of Shonan.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a throw-in for Shonan, close to Cerezo's area.
Throw-in for Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 3, Can Cerezo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
Cerezo to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
Daiki Kaneko for Shonan gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 4, Akihiko Ikeuchi awards Cerezo a goal kick.
Ball safe as Shonan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Shonan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 6, Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
Throw-in for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
In Osaka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 8, Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a Cerezo throw-in in Shonan's half.
Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
Can Cerezo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
In the minute 10, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Cerezo.
Yasuki Kimoto's header is off-target for Cerezo.
In the minute 11, Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
Cerezo have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Cerezo.
In the minute 14, Akihiko Ikeuchi awards the home team a throw-in.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 20, Cerezo are whistled for offside.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Akihiko Ikeuchi.
Shonan are pushing forward but Satoshi Tanaka's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 22, Cerezo have a goal kick.
Shonan are coming forward and Satoshi Tanaka gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
In the minute 25, Shonan to take a throw-in in Cerezo territory.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a Cerezo throw-in in Shonan's half.
Tarik Elyounoussi (Shonan) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 32, It's a goal kick for the home team in Osaka.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Osaka.
In the minute 34, Hiroshi Kiyotake for Cerezo drives towards goal at Yanmar Stadium Nagai. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Cerezo.
Cerezo's Bruno Pereira Mendes attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 35, Shonan have a goal kick.
Free kick for Shonan in the half of Cerezo.
Goal kick for Shonan at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
In the minute 39, Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Cerezo in the half of Shonan.
Akihiko Ikeuchi awards Cerezo a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Shonan at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
Cerezo are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 43, In Osaka, Tarik Elyounoussi of Shonan is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Akihiko Ikeuchi.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Cerezo.
Akihiko Ikeuchi will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Cerezo's Yusuke Maruhashi misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 45, Kosei Tani for Shonan has been booked by Akihiko Ikeuchi and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Akihiko Ikeuchi.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, Akihiko Ikeuchi awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Cerezo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a Shonan throw-in in Cerezo's half.
In the minute 48, Cerezo needs to be cautious. Shonan have an attacking throw-in.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
Throw-in for Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 50, Shonan to take a throw-in in Cerezo territory.
Ball safe as Cerezo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Cerezo.
In the minute 55, Shonan are pushing forward but Tarik Elyounoussi's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Osaka.
Important block from the Shonan defence as Tatsuhiro Sakamoto fires in a strike for Cerezo.
In the minute 56, Throw-in high up the field for Shonan in Osaka.
Throw-in for Shonan close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Cerezo.
In the minute 58, Shonan will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Cerezo.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to Cerezo.
Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Akihiko Ikeuchi.
Bruno Pereira Mendes (Cerezo) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 63, Goal kick for Shonan at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
The home team replace Bruno Pereira Mendes with Yuta Toyokawa.
Akihiko Ikeuchi awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 65, Free kick Cerezo.
In Osaka Cerezo attack through Hiroshi Kiyotake. The finish is off target, however.
Shonan have a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Throw-in Shonan.
In the minute 67, Temma Matsuda is on a sub for Tarik Elyounoussi for Shonan.
Shonan make their second substitution with Mitsuki Saito replacing Satoshi Tanaka.
Hiroto Nakagawa is replacing Akimi Barada for the away team.
Cerezo are caught offside.
Throw-in for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Shonan in their own half.
Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
Jun Nishikawa is on a sub for Hiroaki Okuno for Cerezo.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Cerezo.
Ball safe as Cerezo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 74, Cerezo's Jun Nishikawa has been booked in Osaka.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Shonan.
Yuta Toyokawa (Cerezo) has received a yellow card from Akihiko Ikeuchi.
In the minute 76, Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
Cerezo to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Akihiko Ikeuchi.
In the minute 79, Corner awarded to Shonan.
Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 80, Cerezo make their third substitution with Toshiyuki Takagi replacing Tatsuhiro Sakamoto.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
Corner awarded to Shonan.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Cerezo in their own half.
Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Cerezo.
In the minute 87, Cerezo's Toshiyuki Takagi misses with an attempt on goal.
Akihiko Ikeuchi awards Shonan a goal kick.
Cerezo push forward at Yanmar Stadium Nagai and Yuta Toyokawa gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Shonan defence.
In the minute 88, Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Akihiko Ikeuchi.
Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Akihiko Ikeuchi.
In Osaka, Jun Nishikawa (Cerezo) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Osaka.
Goal kick for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
At Yanmar Stadium Nagai the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Cerezo.
Can Shonan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cerezo's half?
Free kick for Shonan in the half of Cerezo.
Shonan are coming forward and Takuya Okamoto gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-0.
Cerezo move into a 1-0 lead through a Matej Jonjic header.
Great play from Yusuke Maruhashi to set up the goal.
